Class RetailTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • RetailTransaction

  • public class RetailTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Information for 1 transaction from a store

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Initialize a new transaction with default values.
      RetailTransaction(long id, int registerId, java.lang.String date, TransactionTypeEnum type)
      Initialize a new transaction with the information passed to id, registerId, date, and type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RetailTransaction

        public RetailTransaction(long id,
                         int registerId,
                         java.lang.String date,
                         TransactionTypeEnum type)
        Initialize a new transaction with the information passed to id, registerId, date, and type. No items are added to the transaction.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique number for the transaction
        registerId - Unique number for the register the transaction is completed on
        date - Date and time of the transaction
        type - Whether the transaction is a sale or return

      • RetailTransaction

        public RetailTransaction()
        Initialize a new transaction with default values. The transaction's id is set to 0, register id to 0, date to an empty string, and type to UNDEFINED. No items are added to the transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • scanItem

        public void scanItem(Product itemScanned,
                     int quantity,
                     int warrantyQuantity)
        Add a new item type to the transaction or update an existing one, depending on whether or not the item is already in the transaction
        Parameters:
        itemScanned - Item to add/update
        quantity - Quantity to add
        warrantyQuantity - Warranty quantity to add

      • calculateTransactionTotal

        public double calculateTransactionTotal()
        Total cost for all items in transaction
        Returns:
        Total cost of transaction including 7.25% tax and 10% warranty on items with a warranty purchased

      • getNumberOfProductsSold

        public int getNumberOfProductsSold()
        Total number of products sold in transaction
        Returns:
        Number of products sold

      • generateReceipt

        public void generateReceipt()
        Create receipt for transaction and write it to a file of the name receipt_[transaction id]_[register id].txt

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation used for output
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String output for files and console

      • formatTotalSales

        public static java.lang.String formatTotalSales()
        String value of the amount of all transactions completed
        Returns:
        String of the total sales in dollar format; is enclosed in parentheses if the amount is negative

      • getTransactionId

        public long getTransactionId()
        Unique identifier for the transaction
        Returns:
        Transaction identifier

      • getTransactionType

        public TransactionTypeEnum getTransactionType()
        Whether the transaction is a sale or return
        Returns:
        "sale" if sale; "return" if return

        public java.lang.String getTransactionDate()

      • getRegisterId
